name: react-electron-typescript-template
description: A Ready for production electron template with React and Typescript

scripts.dev: IS_DEV=true concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none yarn dev:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && yarn dev:electron" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p electron && electron ."
scripts.prebuild: yarn build:frontend && yarn build:electron && rm -rf build/ && rm -rf dist/ && cp -r ./frontend/build build  && tsc -p electron

author: Carlos Martinez <itscarlosisaac@gmail.com>
